sentences.en: Although he is getting on ( in years ), he is still strong and lusty.
sentences.cn: 他虽然年岁渐增, 但还是身强力壮,精力充沛.

sentences.en: Besides, she was young and lusty and would defend herself.
sentences.cn: 何况, 她年纪轻、力气大,一定会自卫.

sentences.en: He has his lusty Spring, when fancy clear.

sentences.cn: 她那位年富力强的丈夫

sentences.en: On the benches in his shop were the lusty and valiant young men.
sentences.cn: 他店内登子上坐的却都是一些强壮骠悍的小伙子.

sentences.en: the lusty cry of a new-born baby
The lusty youth spotted that marriageable girl, but he didn't speak directly to her.
sentences.cn: 壮实的小伙子瞧上了那个未嫁的少女, 但他一直不上前直接答话.

sentences.en: The sling cradles the neck and keeps the legs open wide for lusty accessibility.
sentences.cn: 吊索生长脖子和保持腿开放宽为好色的可及性.

sentences.en: They are well - fed, lusty stallions, each neighing for another man's wife.
sentences.cn: 他们像?饱的马 、 到处乱跑 、 各向他邻舍的妻发嘶声.

sentences.en: They were all lusty , weather - beaten fellows , hard of hand, bold of eyes.
sentences.cn: 他们都是身强力壮、拳大臂粗 、 目光炯炯、饱经风霜的汉子.

trans.tran_cn: 健壮的，强壮的，又高又粗
